summary: A sequential container that applies a series of augmentation modules to 5‑dimensional video tensors (batch, time, channels, height, width or batch, channels, time, height, width). It can enforce identical transformations across all frames, randomly choose a subset of augmentations, and propagate inverse operations and metadata transformations (boxes, masks, keypoints).
business_intent: Provide a flexible, temporally consistent augmentation pipeline for video data, simplifying preprocessing and data augmentation for video deep‑learning models while supporting stochastic selection and reversible transformations.
